comment: If any representation of a graph with vertices ` V ` and edges ` E ` is an element of an arbitrary class ` C ` , then any structure with base set ` V ` and value ` E ` in the slot for edge functions (which is such a representation of a graph with vertices ` V ` and edges ` E ` ) is an element of this class ` C ` . (Contributed by AV, 12-Oct-2020.) (Revised by AV, 9-Jun-2021.)
